page.title: 06Simon De Montfort School
page.content: This school opened in 1976 and is for children aged 10_13 who live within the town boundary,to the south of the River Avon but east of the river Isbourne. The school has 14 classrooms and specialist rooms for science,craft, design,homecraft and music.There is a gymnasium with changing rooms and showers and an assembly /dining hall. The school also has a library. Children are given between 1 and 2 hours homework depending on ability. They must wear a school uniform, the colours of which are grey and navy. School meals are available in the form of a private cafeteria system. The children can take part in many activities before school,at lunch time,after school and at weekends.They also have several school trips including one to France.
